title: Blended Learning-Based Language Education Curriculum Design and Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational theories and language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Language education course development program focused on strengthening blended learning environment design capabilities for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners design ≥3 optimized integration strategies for online/offline activities in blended learning models
Learners develop ≥1 customized language education content based on learner needs analysis
Learners measure blended learning effectiveness and propose improvements using formative assessment tools
Learners create integrated lesson plans linking digital platforms (LMS) with offline instruction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
